text: NO ONE has ever satisfactorily explained how a single-decker Welsh bus could have got itself into orbit. Shooting up over the pass a bit too carefree, and becoming airborne? Caught by a sudden gust of wind? A combination of the two? No one seems to know. But the fact remains that get itself into orbit it did.
handwritten_text: NO ONE has ever satisfactorily explained how a single-decker Welsh bus could have got itself into orbit. Shooting up over the pass a bit too carefree, and becoming airborne? Caught by a sudden gust of wind? A combination of the two? No one seems to know. But the fact remains that get itself into orbit it did.
